javadoc:
This represents a table that stores all possible function tags available for use.
 The table consists of two columns: one for the tag name, and one indicating
 whether this tag is modifiable.
 
 Non-modifiable tags cannot be deleted or edited by any user. These are typically
 tags that have been pre-loaded via some external mechanism and need to be 
 preserved as originally defined.

methods.name: getAdapter
getRecords
methods.comment: Returns all tag records in the database.

methods.name: getRecord
methods.comment: Returns a record matching the given tag name, or null if not found.

return.comment: Record, or null if not found

methods.name: getRecord
methods.comment: Returns the tag record with the given id.

return.comment: Record, or null if not found

methods.name: createTagRecord
methods.comment: Creates a Record with the given tag name.

methods.name: updateRecord
methods.comment: Updates the database record for a tag.

methods.name: removeTagRecord
methods.comment: Removes the tag with the given name from the database.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the total number of tags in the database.
@return the number of tags
methods.name: getNumTags
methods.comment: Returns the total number of tags in the database.

name: FunctionTagAdapter
